title: Possible fix for dc in ranked
body: If a player is dc for 15%-20%+ of a game and you lose that game, your lp loss has a 25% loss reduction for every dc champ, maxing at 0 lp lost if its a 1v5, winning a game with a dc also increases the gain by 35/70/105/140% bonus lp, so if you win a 1v5 game where you would have gotten 20 lp for the win, you gain 48 lp instead

replies.body:
The problem i see with this is in the case of a legitmate DC that is going to lose you the game, you have to delay for at least a good 5-10 minutes to actually have the chance of getting that reduction.

Example, someone DC's at 20 minutes, for 20% of the game having them DC'd you'd have to delay till 25 minutes in a 4v5 to actually get said reduction in LP loss.
then thats just your bad luck, its still better to have the option
And then this is extremely abusable.

thanks for the -1, because a downvote is real good on a suggestion. 

Its abusable how? not like you are going to fancy yourself a dc then rejoin and expect a bonus, if you dc for more than 10% you can be auto removed from the possibility of bonus lp
